DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic types for a railing that are specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given for the predefined types.
NOTE  The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no IfcRailingType is assigned, providing its own IfcRailingType.PredefinedType.
IFC2x CHANGE  The attribute has been changed into an OPTIONAL attribute.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcRailingType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcRailingTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcRailingTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no railing type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcRailingType.
